languages.text: "Да прольется река крови к трону владыки! Да вознесется пирамида из черепов Его врагов!"
"May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"
languages.original_text: "Да прольется река крови к трону владыки! Да вознесется пирамида из черепов Его врагов!"

traits.locale_text: "May a river of blood flow toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise, made of His enemies' skulls!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May a river of blood flow toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise, made of His enemies' skulls!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «¡Que un río de sangre fluya hacia el trono del Amo! ¡Que se alce una pirámide sobre los cráneos de Sus enemigos!».
languages.original_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que un río de sangre fluya hacia el trono del Amo! ¡Que se alce una pirámide sobre los cráneos de Sus enemigos!».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “愿鲜血在主人的王座下奔流不止！愿祂敌人的头骨堆积成山！”
languages.original_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: “愿鲜血在主人的王座下奔流不止！愿祂敌人的头骨堆积成山！”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Que le trône du Maître soit baigné d'une rivière de sang ! Que les crânes de Ses ennemis forment une montagne ! »
languages.original_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: « Que le trône du Maître soit baigné d'une rivière de sang ! Que les crânes de Ses ennemis forment une montagne ! »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「主の玉座に向かって血の川が流れ出んことを！主の敵の頭骨が山と積まれんことを！」
languages.original_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: 「主の玉座に向かって血の川が流れ出んことを！主の敵の頭骨が山と積まれんことを！」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Möge ein Fluss aus Blut zum Thron des Meisters strömen! Möge sich aus den Schädeln seiner Feinde eine Pyramide errichten!"
languages.original_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge ein Fluss aus Blut zum Thron des Meisters strömen! Möge sich aus den Schädeln seiner Feinde eine Pyramide errichten!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Efendi'nin tahtına doğru bir kan nehri çağlasın! O'nun düşmanlarının kellesinden koca bir piramit yükselsin!"
languages.original_text: "May a river of blood flood forth toward the Master's throne! May a pyramid rise from the skulls of His enemies!"

traits.locale_text: "Efendi'nin tahtına doğru bir kan nehri çağlasın! O'nun düşmanlarının kellesinden bir piramit yükselsin!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
